title: A Common Scandal
description: Amelia Wheeler, daughter of an arms manufacturer, grew up running wild on the Portsmouth docks alongside Nathaniel Smythe, the impoverished son of a sailor. When her father’s business suddenly catapults them to the ranks of the newly rich, she leaves Portsmouth behind for London and the pursuit of a titled husband.Ten years later, she encounters Nate Smythe in the last place she expects, a London ballroom. Nate, now a successful ship owner, is engaged in his own matrimonial pursuit, needing a proper bride of noble birth if he ever wants to ascend to those rarified circles of society and gain access to the business that gets conducted there.A weeklong house party throws them together, and they discover a simmering passion that’s impossible to deny. Nate’s nearly betrothed to the Hon. Julia Harrow and Amelia is on the cusp of marriage to Lord Radwill and yet they can’t seem to stay away from each other. But another of Amelia’s titled suitors is hiding a desperate secret that could put her in peril.
author: Amanda  Weaver
